# we-modal



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description | Type      | Default |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------- | --------- | ------- |
| `isVisible` | `is-visible` |             | `boolean` | `true`  |


## Events

| Event           | Description | Type               |
| --------------- | ----------- | ------------------ |
| `modalCallback` |             | `CustomEvent<any>` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                       | Description                                                                                                        |
| -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| `--back--align-items`      | Align items of back of modal, it affects the vertical position of modal in the page <br> Default: center           |
| `--back--background`       | Background of back of modal <br> Default: rgba(128, 128, 128, 0.35)                                                |
| `--back--justify-content`  | Justify content of back of modal, it affects the horizontal position of modal in the page <br> Default: center     |
| `--modal--align-items`     | Align items of modal, it affects the vertical position of the elements inside the modal <br> Default: unset        |
| `--modal--background`      | Background of modal <br> Default: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)                                                           |
| `--modal--border`          | Border of modal <br> Default: none                                                                                 |
| `--modal--border-radius`   | Border radius of modal <br> Default: 0.625em                                                                       |
| `--modal--display`         | Display option of modal <br> Default: flex                                                                         |
| `--modal--height`          | Height of modal <br> Default: 18.750em                                                                             |
| `--modal--justify-content` | Justify content of modal, it affects the horizontal position of the elements inside the modal <br> Default: center |
| `--modal--padding`         | Padding of modal <br> Default: 0.625em                                                                             |
| `--modal--width`           | Width of modal <br> Default: 12.500em                                                                              |
